devdoc.details: Handles rent payments, USDC settlement, and event emission                            PAYMENT FLOW                                                                                                                                                 TENANT    PAY     CONVERT  SETTLE                                  RENT        TO USDC      ON ARC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 EMIT         VAULT        UPDATE                        EVENTS       DEPOSIT       LEASE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         REPUTATION UPDATE + AI TRIGGERS

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payRent(uint256).details: This is the main entry point for rent payments Flow: Tenant  USDC  Vault  Lease Update  Reputation Update

params.leaseId: The lease ID to pay rent for

returns.paymentId: The ID of the payment record

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: NomaPayment

AIAgentTrigger(string,uint256,bytes).notice: Emitted for AI agent trigger points

LeaseCreated(uint256,address,address,uin.notice: Emitted when a new lease is created

PaymentSettled(uint256,uint256,uint256,s.notice: Emitted when payment is settled on Arc

checkRentDue(uint256).notice: Check if rent is due for a lease

getLeasePayments(uint256).notice: Get all payments for a lease

getPaymentHistory(uint256).notice: Get payment history for a lease

gracePeriod().notice: Grace period for late payments (in seconds)

leasePayments(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping of lease ID to payment IDs

payRentCustomAmount(uint256,uint256).notice: Pay rent with custom amount (partial or advance)

payments(uint256).notice: Mapping of payment ID to payment data

setGracePeriod(uint256).notice: Set grace period for late payments

userdoc.notice: Core payment processing contract for NOMA protocol
